scripts.examples: npm run build && npm run examples:import-elision
scripts.examples:import-elision: echo '=== Import Elision Examples ===' && node dist/import-elision/ex1-basic-elision.js && echo '' && node dist/import-elision/ex2-mixed-usage.js && echo '' && node dist/import-elision/ex3-type-only-imports.js && echo '' && node dist/import-elision/ex4-circular-dependencies.js
